nav.div: Mountain View Whisman School District » About » Communications » News & Events » Free meals during school closure

img.span: Starting Wednesday, March 18, MVWSD will provide free meals to students who rely on us for support while our campuses are closed for instruction. Free meals for children under the age of 18 will be at Gabriela Mistral Elementary (505 Escuela Ave) parking lot from 11:30 a.m. to 1 p.m. Free lunch and breakfast for the next day will be available in this location every weekday until school reopens.
